full_summary:
### Rescue Tool RFP

**Reference ID:** W8485-258244/A

**Amendment ID:** 2

**Publication Date:** June 20, 2024
#### Important Dates
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 29, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Request for Proposals**
The Department of National Defence has released a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a procurement of Rescue Tools. The delivery is required to the following locations by December 2024:
* 25 CFSD Montreal
* 7 CFSD Edmonton
#### Items Being Purchased

We are seeking the following items:

* Item 1: Rescue Tool (NSN: 4240-01-509-3107, NIBS: 4240)
	+ Part Number: PRT-X
	+ NCAGE: CF746
	+ Quantity: 150 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Location: 25 CFSD Montreal
* Item 2: Rescue Tool (GSIN: 4240, NSN: 4240-01-509-3107)
	+ Part Number: PRT-X
	+ NCAGE: CF746
	+ Quantity: 150 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Location: 7 CFSD Edmonton

**Note on COVID-19 Pandemic**
Bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service, due to reduced business hours and limited staff at the bid receiving unit.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The selection criteria for this procurement will be based on the Lowest Price criteria.

**Language and Document Submission**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
* Audrée Poissant-Viau, MCpl
* Phone: 00
* Email: [audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca](mailto:audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca)

#### Key Documents
You may obtain the full RFP by visiting the Government of Canada’s procurement website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) and searching for the RFP ID: W8485-258244/A. Requires login. Attachments include:

* W8485-258244---
